channel.title: Syntax on Peter Izsak
channel.description: Recent content in Syntax on Peter Izsak

item.description: Peter Izsak is a Senior Data and Applied Scientist at Microsoft, specializing in the development and implementation of advanced Natural Language Processing solutions for the healthcare sector. With extensive expertise in computational linguistics and machine learning, he architects innovative NLP systems that address complex healthcare challenges. Prior to joining Microsoft, he served as a Research Scientist and Team Lead at Intel Labs, where he spearheaded research initiatives at the intersection of Deep Learning and Natural Language Processing.
